title: Hot Spring on Gardener's River
medium:
Recto: Brush and black wash over graphite on buff-colored paper.
Verso: Graphite on buff-colored paper.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of a small hot spring on Gardener's River located in a  wooded valley, with mountain ranges in background.
Verso: Horizontal view of a distant Corinne, Utah at foot of snow capped mountains.
name: Drawing
